participant_1.background:
I'm happy to be doing well in school.
I'm going to enjoy my weekend without any kids around.
I am not sure if it is fair to tax the rich more than the poor, but I do know that cats are awesome.
I usually wake up and play piano to clear my head before starting the day.
My family eats healthy, goes for walks, and enjoys the Fourth of July together.

participant_2.background:
I spent my last year learning about art and history so that I can be a better museum curator.
i work 9 to 5 job.
i like watching ufc fights.
i favorite brand of clothing is donna karen.
I wake up early, feed my cats, and read my favorite comic books before I start blogging.

content.text: Hey! It's good to meet you!
What do you do for a living?
I work as a museum curator. I love it!
That sounds like a really fun job! What kind of museum do you work in?
I work in an art museum. I'm really passionate about art, so it's a great fit for me.
That's awesome! I love art too. I like to go to museums and galleries whenever I can.
Me too! I love seeing all the different kinds of art that people have created.
What's your favorite type of art?
I like all kinds of art, but I'm especially drawn to paintings. I love the way that paintings can capture a moment in time and tell a story.
I agree! I love paintings too. They're so beautiful and expressive.
Do you have any favorite paintings?
I do! I love Van Gogh's "Starry Night". It's so beautiful and peaceful.
"Starry Night" is a great painting! I love the way the colors and light come together to create such a magical scene.
Me too! It's one of my favorite paintings of all time.
I'm glad you like it! It's definitely one of my favorites too
